title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 September 2014 - XWiki
content:

08:51 <cjd> 08:49 < finnbot> cjd: optimization could be verscchlimmbesserung (pronounced: fair-shleam-besser-oonk) lit:make-wose-better-ment When you  improve something and it ends up worse than when you started..  
08:51 <cjd> heh  
08:51 <cjd> multi-line doesn't work with /msg

09:40 <vmassol> good morning, starting the work of supporting JSX/SSX in HTML exports, shouldn't take too long  
09:54 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <sdjebloun> has joined #xwiki

12:26 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
12:30 <woshilapin> has quit  
12:31 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
12:33 <cjd> ip route reroute  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: Wysiwyg.css is not the same in platform and in an instance  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: I guess some content has been added at the build time  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> do you remember when?  
12:36 <gdelhumeau> Hmm I see the other content is on the same folder  
12:36 <gdelhumeau> it must be the "minification" step in XE  
13:06 <Denis> has quit  
13:25 <mflorea> gdelhmeau: yes, see the pom in xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-war  
13:28 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:37 <vmassol> I'd be curious to be able to talk to one of these spammer to understand where it fails in our onboarding process  
13:37 <vmassol> whether they voluntarily spam us or not  
13:38 <vmassol> this guy was not putting any real spam, he was just testing the wiki with some personal content…  
13:39 <vmassol> btw I'm getting real close to finishing the support of JSX/SSX in HTML export  
13:39 <vmassol> :)  
13:48 <Denis> has quit  
13:48 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <sdjebloun\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:53 <sdjebloun> has quit  
13:53 <sdjebloun\_> is now known as <sdjebloun>  
14:25 <Denis> has quit  
14:29 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: nice :)  
14:31 <vmassol> cleaning up everything and committing  
14:32 <vmassol> there are at least 2 more issues though but they're more minor...  
14:32 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <sdjebloun> has quit  
14:41 <vmassol> so what's our status with the build?  
14:42 <vmassol> anyone helping out with it?  
14:42 <vmassol> we need to release ASAP  
14:42 <vmassol> how are the ohter blocking jira issues progressing?  
14:44 <vmassol> ci doesn't seem in good shape… can't get the home page to display ATM…  
14:44 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:44 <vmassol> has someone restarted it today?  
14:45 <vmassol> I see the following in the logs  
14:45 <vmassol> Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded  
14:45 <vmassol> going to restart it  
14:45 <vmassol> (if I can)  
14:48 <vmassol> pleaee don't access jenkins  
14:48 <msmeria> has quit  
14:48 <vmassol> it has some memory issue and I'm trying to retsart it from the ui  
14:52 <vmassol> 5 blocking issues remaining for RC1: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10907?jql=fixVersion%20%3D%20%226.2-rc-1%22%20and%20resolution%3DUnresolved  
14:52 <vmassol> who can help?  
14:52 <vmassol> gdelhumeau is assigned to 1 but there are 4 without anyone assigned  
14:53 <vmassol> not very good knowing that RC1 was supposed to happen yesterday  
14:54 <vmassol> I'm going to move 1 issue to 6.2 final  
14:55 <vmassol> should we move XWIKI-10661 to 6.2 final for now?  
14:55 <vmassol> AFAIU gdelhumeau has no idea on how to fix it ATM, right?  
14:55 <gdelhumeau> right  
14:55 <gdelhumeau> actually, I have one  
14:55 <gdelhumeau> it is to modify bootstrap sources  
14:56 <vmassol> you mean all apps built with bootstrap will also fail?  
14:56 <gdelhumeau> no I don't mean that  
14:56 <vmassol> ok I've pushed several issues to 6.2 final (not good I know but we need to progress)  
14:57 <vmassol> there are still 2 blockers to finish  
14:57 <vmassol> and the build that has to pass  
14:57 <sdjebloun> has joined #xwiki  
15:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
15:11 <vmassol> ok jenkins restarted, triggering comons job  
15:22 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:37 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
15:37 <vmassol> fixing http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/6006/console  
15:37 <vmassol> problem of lowercase/uppercase, grrrr  
15:40 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
15:44 <vmassol> hmm last jenkins emails again has: Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded  
15:44 <vmassol> maybe we just need more memory now  
15:45 <vmassol> the quality profile consumes more memory for sure  
15:45 <vmassol> we're using -Xmx1536m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m -Xms256m  
15:45 <vmassol> a solution is to do what I wanted to do, i.e. have one job per module in platform....  
15:46 <mkolenda> has joined #xwiki  
15:46 <vmassol> increasing a bit the memory ATM  
15:46 <vmassol> only for thi job  
15:52 <momomomomo> has quit  
15:58 <vmassol> ah forgot one thing….  
15:59 <vmassol> I need to uncache the skin extensions first....  
16:00 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
16:01 <mkolenda> vmassol, i make translations from en->pl at l10n.xwiki.org. Filling forms is all what I have to do, or there is something else?  
16:01 <vmassol> that's all :)  
16:01 <vmassol> it'll get taken into account at the next release  
16:01 <vmassol> (mkolenda)  
16:02 <vmassol> thanks for your contributions!  
16:02 <mkolenda> okay :)  
16:02 <vmassol> dziękuję  
16:02 <vmassol> bardzo  
16:03 <mkolenda> nie ma sprawy : )  
16:03 <Lyes1> has quit  
16:03 <vmassol> nie mowie po polsku ! (or something like that)  
16:07 <momomomomo\_> has joined #xwiki  
16:09 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:09 <momomomomo\_> is now known as <momomomomo>  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> majestically :)  
16:11 <vmassol> :)  
16:11 <vmassol> something is amiss....  
16:11 <vmassol> suddently the html export doesn't work anymore....  
16:11 <vmassol> debugging....  
16:12 <vmassol> ah no the caching is ok actually since that's done on the client side  
16:12 <vmassol> one thing less to handle, cool  
16:14 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: what do you think about XWIKI-10661 ? (I know there is a lot to read...) Should I try to modify the bootstrap sources at the build?  
16:16 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:19 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: have you dsicussed on the bootstrap list already?  
16:20 <gdelhumeau> no  
16:21 <gdelhumeau> this bug only occurs on the wysiwyg  
16:21 <gdelhumeau> but I haven't manage to find why  
16:21 <gdelhumeau> I don't like this solution, ie modifying BS  
16:21 <gdelhumeau> but this issue is blocking us for too long  
16:21 <vmassol> if you modify bootstrap it means you think it's buggy and if it's buggy you could talk with them to understand 1) what is wrong and 2) if there's a workaround  
16:22 <vmassol> you mentioned the :empty selector  
16:22 <vmassol> why don't you research that lead?  
16:23 <gdelhumeau> the wysiwyg editor does not even use the :empty selector  
16:24 <vmassol> you said that if you remove the :empty selector it works  
16:24 <vmassol> and when you put it back it crashes  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> yes  
16:24 <vmassol> seems pretty conclusinve  
16:24 <vmassol> conclusive  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> but it does not fail on other page  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> it does not even fail on the wysiwyg if there is no list within a link in it  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> which is completly silly  
16:25 <vmassol> I'm not going to solve it now for sure :  
16:25 <vmassol> :)  
16:25 <vmassol> what I'm sayinf is that if I were you I'd ask experts  
16:25 <vmassol> I don'tsee any better alternative  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> I don't know how to present that to them  
16:28 <gdelhumeau> we must have something in our wysiwyg editor that IE does not like when :empty selector are used  
16:28 <gdelhumeau> but... what  
16:28 <vmassol> and you reall really think xwiki is unique in the whole world?  
16:29 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/14512  
16:36 <vmassol> you created an issue  
16:36 <gdelhumeau> there is nothing else  
16:36 <gdelhumeau> except maybe IRC  
16:37 <vmassol> not true  
16:37 <vmassol> took me just 1mn to find it...  
16:37 <vmassol> http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started/#community  
16:37 <vmassol> so you can use stackoverflow  
16:38 <gdelhumeau> do you think it is better?  
16:39 <vmassol> on one hand you are creating a discussion in an issue that's going to be viewed by …. 10 persons… OTOH you're creating a proper question for help that's going to be viewed by …. 1000+ persons… you choose….  
16:39 <gdelhumeau> ok moving it  
16:39 <vmassol> I need to work a bit  
16:39 <vmassol> and I won't be able to work after 20:00 tonight  
16:39 <vmassol> and I'm late now  
16:40 <vmassol> so I'm not aswering any more here, let others have a go! :)  
16:40 <vmassol> bfn  
16:43 <gdelhumeau> I'm working on XWIKI-10838 right now
